Description.Text: Hotel Grand Washington is located in the centre of the old city. Guest can easily reach the most famous historical places Hagia Sophia museum, The Sultanahmet (blue) Mosque, the Topkapi Palace and Grand Bazaar. The hotel is also located 15 km away from Atat√ºrk Airport. It is also 15 km to the CNR convention centre and 20 km to the TUYAP convention centre. The tram stop is approximately 7 minutes away. All rooms have A/C system, satellite TV system, minibar, hair dryer, safe box, direct phone, wireless and internet system, bathroom with bathtub.
